questions.question: Has the user posted at least 5 tweets in the last 30 days?
Is the user a member of more than 3 Discord servers?
Has the user sent at least 10 messages in Telegram groups in the last 14 days?
Does the user have active accounts on at least 2 different social platforms?
Has the user engaged with content (likes, retweets, replies) in the last 7 days?
Does the user have a consistent posting pattern (at least weekly) on any platform?
